## TryCpServer.start() method

Builds and starts a local TryCP server on the specified port.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static start(port?: number): Promise<TryCpServer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  port | number | the network port the server should listen on |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TryCpServer](./tryorama.trycpserver.md)<!-- -->&gt;

a promise that resolves to the newly created server instance
